about_the_game:
Somewhere in the borough of Brocklyn, nestled within the urban jungle of New Yock City, Tom and his mother are celebrating his 10th birthday. When a wrapped present arrives, Tom rips through it, excited to see what’s inside.

What he finds is...not, the coolest and latest in tiny household robo tech, but some knockoff model—koROBO...? That’s bogus!!

But before long, koROBO is cleaning the home, helping Tom with his homework, and even playing games and reading comics with him like a brother.

What will koROBO’s introduction have in store for Tom and his family?

TINY HERO, BIG ADVENTURE

Traverse around the family home, clean up mess, and solve problems wherever you find them—a big ask for such a tiny hero!

Be careful, though! koROBO’s battery is limited, and performing tasks will drain it even faster. koROBO needs to bathe in some rays in order to charge the solar battery strapped to his back. Keep an eye out for patches of sunlight to make sure you keep running at peak capacity!

While exploring Tom’s apartment building, you won’t just be helping out him and his family—there’s a whole host of kooky denizens living out their lives that koROBO will encounter. Talk to these characters and solve their problems to unlock some of koROBO’s most powerful upgrades!

BETTER, FASTER, STRONGER

Collect items as you clean and explore to upgrade koROBO and what they can do. While he will start out being able to run, jump, and glide, in time he’ll also be able to fly, swim, and even travel through time?!

Wait, but there’s more! koROBO isn’t the only toy in Tom’s retinue. Discover new miniature friends and gain an assortment of attachments that’ll allow him to adventure and sometimes even fight in new and exciting ways! The parts you’ll need to find for your upgrades can be found all over the house. Collect as many as you can to upgrade Tiny Wonder!

HOUSE OF FUTURE PAST

While koROBO has a whole apartment and family to clean and explore, you’ll be doing much more than just traveling around the home.

Eventually, koROBO will obtain the radical ability to travel through time. When will you go with time travel at your fingertips?

name: koROBO
short_description: koROBO is an action adventure game that follows the story of a pint-sized robot named “koROBO” and his owner, Tom, a young boy who receives koROBO as a gift from his father on his 10th birthday. Players step into the tiny but mighty shoes of koROBO, embarking on a thrilling and heartfelt journey.
